textBeforeTable: Imported Machine wash cold, gentle cycle; do not tumble dry; do not dry clean Three zippered pockets Full front zipper 100% polyester Unfortunately we can't snuggle up to our furry friends all winter long. For those moments when you need to go out in the cold, our fuzzy warm jacket is the next best thing. The super plush fleece jacket keeps you snug in a high neck, fitted cuffs, and full zipper front, with the ease of three zippered front pockets and the final touch -- a rubber paw print above the heart. Buy a Coat, Give a Coat! Add this item to your order & enter code GIVEACOAT in the promotion code box before checkout to help donate a warm coat -- at no additional cost -- through Soles4Souls, a nonprofit organization giving shoes & coats to those in need both in the U.S. and abroad!
